name: Year of the Raven
description:
The Emperor decrees the need for a 13th divine animal to be added as a Zodiac. You play as Corvus, a blackbird who decides to shoot their shot for the title. However, you first must gain the original 12 Zodiac animals' approval by solving each of their unique puzzles and earning stars to form your constellation. With the help of your wind powers, make your way through their cloudy realm in order to ascend to divinity!

Use your pecking and tornado abilities to solve puzzles and collect stars for your constellation!

Blackbird Studio

Paul Toprac - Producer

Audrey Stein- Co-producer

Soo Aguilar - 2D Artist

Joriann Bassi - Programmer, Sound Designer

Faith Fuller - 3D Artist

Aayush Gupta - Designer, Writer

Jiaxin Huang - Programmer, Designer

Zane Stewart - Designer, Writer, Scrum Master

Clinton Thai - Artist

Matthew Zhang - Programmer, Designer, Composer
